unnormalised: Just FYI, when paying your BSES bill online, remember to check if the convenience fee is included. Sometimes, they add Rs. 10-20 extra for using a credit card. Also, look out for cashback offers on apps like PhonePe or Paytm; you might save ₹50-₹100! And if you pay before the 7th of the month, many providers give a 2% discount, so prepone your payment!
